name: Soccer Pro - Free Football
description:
Soccer on the big screen is finally available. Use your Siri remote to score against all the top 30 countries in the world. Aim... shoot... Goal!

Recent reviews...
* "This game is so addictive!!!"
Dave_92, 5 star reviewer

* "Finally a great soccer game for Apple TV!"
Rone, 5 star reviewer

Do you have any feedback? Please email soccer@inlovewith.com and we'll add your idea to our list.

Coming updates
— Different stadiums
— More accurate passing
— Multiplayer support using Gamepad
